text:
The attached draft is revised to specify that TW is soliciting requests for a 
term of 5 years.  Please forward your comments to me by the end of Monday, 
December 4th.

Thanks again!
Lindy

headers.to: steven.harris@enron.com, mary.miller@enron.com, drew.fossum@enron.com, susan.scott@enron.com, kevin.hyatt@enron.com, lorraine.lindberg@enron.com
headers.subject: Revised Draft Open Season Posting
headers.x-to: Steven Harris, Mary Kay Miller, Drew Fossum, Susan Scott, Kevin Hyatt, Lorraine Lindberg

subject: Revised Draft Open Season Posting
